articles.title: US warns ships to stay out of parts of Red Sea as Houthi rebels vow retaliation for US, UK strikes - The Associated Press
articles.description: The U.S. Navy is warning American-flagged vessels to stay out of areas around Yemen in the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden for the next 72 hours. The warning in a notice to shippers came as Yemen’s Houthi rebels vowed on Friday fierce retaliation for American an…
articles.content: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) The U.S. Navy on Friday warned American-flagged vessels to steer clear of areas around Yemen in the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden for the next 72 hours after the U.S. … [+8674 chars]

articles.author: Pamela McClintock
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Mean Girls’ Struts to $3.3M in Previews, ‘Beekeeper’ Buzzes to $2.4M - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: 'The Book of Clarence' is also opening nationwide over the long Martin Luther King Jr. holiday weekend, while awards hopeful 'American Fiction' expands.
articles.content:
Mean Girls strutted to $3.3 million in previews at the North American box office, on par with Wonka.
Paramount’s movie adaptation of the Broadway musical is based on the 2004 big-screen teen comedy … [+2056 chars]
